<a target="_blank" href="https://www.peoplescollection.wales/itesm/31753">Transcription for 31753</a>

Ancient, take me back to the ancestors.
My heart and soul.
Alive everywhere for a change.
Suspended, gazing out over a blue ocean.
I don't know what I'm standing on.
Must be the ocean.
The present drinks my pastель.
Meted in the last, most despicable hour.
Like a magical connection.
Timeless.
Like a magical connection.
Timeless.
Like a magical connection.
Like a magical connection.
Like a magical connection.
The magic of spring has appeared again.
Let's be free and listen to the heartbeat of Mother Earth.
I'm so honored to be here, to be able to create, together with other Celtic women.
Let's be free and listen to the heartbeat of Mother Earth.
